item.description:
Hi All,

I came up with a list of bars we can go to in the Faneuil Hall area in Boston. All these bars are a couple of minutes walk from each other. I don't think we have to pay a cover at any of these bars.

2.00PM - 3.00PM - Bell in Hand Tavern

3.00PM - 4.00PM - Paddy O's

4.00PM - 5.00PM - Hennessy's

5.00PM - 6.45PM- Purple Shamrock (Dinner)

7.00PM - 8.00PM - Hong Kong

8.00PM - 9.30PM - Sissy K's

9.30PM - 2.00AM - Jose McIntyres

Cheers!

- Abhi

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: 12 + Beers of Christmas pub crawl
